Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Seminar Innovation Productivity and Firm Performance

Messages.Author: Astrid Cullmann
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Please take a few minutes to evaluate the seminar and give us some feedback (until June 24th). Here is the link. https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?pswd=7X6M4  Thanks for your input!

Messages.Author: Astrid Cullmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, tomorrow at 12:00 we will have our next meeting via Zoom with a presentation and discussion of your research ideas, data, and empirical methods. Here is the link: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/69775185451?pwd=KVR4w1HtYt9cd99Jj8SVJLDbHjKbOD.1 best wishes SIP Team

Discussions.Discussion_Name: New link for Zoom meeting today (32.05.2024) 12:00

Messages.Author: Astrid Cullmann
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I am very sorry! I had to cancel the planned online meeting today at very short notice. Please send me your questions by e-mail and I will try to answer them as soon as possible.  If there is a need, we can also organize a short online meeting next Monday. Please write me an email (in case you need a meeting), and I will send a Zoom link (for 1:00 PM). Sorry again, Astrid Cullmann

Messages.Author: Astrid Cullmann
Messages.Content: Dear Students, Thursday is a holiday. I will organize an additional online meeting via Zoom on Friday (May 10th, 1:30 PM) just in case you have any questions concerning your paper choice, group formation, and presentation. Here is the link: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/67013385049?pwd=ZkdVd1p3SUp4ODdKSmJQVTFFSnBoZz09 If required we organize a further meeting on May 16. The oral presentation of the paper is scheduled May 23. Best wishes, SIP Team

Messages.Author: Astrid Cullmann
Messages.Content: Dear Students, in case you want to join the Whatsapp Group (for organizational matters, working group formation etc.) here is the link sent by the other students: https://chat.whatsapp.com/C4Kz8VVb6c9ELVOGHm1cam SIP Team
